name: A Footer To Page
tagline: A simple WordPress widget that lets you add a link of an existing page to your footer.
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This is a swaggy simple WordPress widget that lets you add a link of an existing page to your footer.
**WHY?**
Because sometimes your clients want to add TONS and TONS of footer pages at random times. Never worry no more!!!
```
1. Download the zip file.
2. Drop it (like it's hot) into your plugins dir.
3. Activate!
```
### Support or Contact
Having trouble? [@katpadi](http://twitter.com/katpadi) is at your service!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
